perks.name: Accelerated Healing
perks.description: Thanks to some natural vigor, the character heals faster than other people, requiring only three-quarters of the normal healing time.

perks.name: Acute Sense: Hearing
perks.description: The character has excellent hearing and tends to notice faint or high-pitched sounds more readily than other people. Gain +1 to Notice checks based on hearing.
perks.downside: Sudden loud noises can momentarily deafen the character.

perks.name: Acute Sense: Sight
perks.description: The character has sharp eyes and tends to notice faraway or small items more readily than other people. Gain +1 to Notice checks based on vision.
perks.downside: Sudden bright lights can momentarily blind the character.

perks.name: Acute Sense: Smell/Taste
perks.description: The character has a sharp nose or palate and can readily identify odors and tastes. Gain +1 to Notice checks based on smell or taste.

perks.name: Ambidextrous
perks.description: The character can use either hand for tasks requiring manual dexterity without the 'Using Off Hand' penalty.

perks.name: Animal Companion
perks.description: The character has a faithful pet, steed or companion animal that is both well trained and emotionally bonded.
perks.downside: Responsibility: pets must be fed, walked and housed.

perks.name: Animal Kinship
perks.description: The character has a 'touch' with animals. Domesticated animals respond well to training, granting +1 to Animal Handling tests.

perks.name: Common Sense
perks.description: The character always considers the outcomes of actions first. The Gamemaster gives warnings when about to do something foolish.

perks.name: Lucky
perks.description: The character is exceptionally lucky. Once per session, the player may elect to reroll a Fumble or switch the modifier of a single die roll.

perks.name: Photographic Memory
perks.description: The character has an excellent memory. Whenever a Knowledge roll is made to recall information, add +1 to the dice roll.
perks.downside: Traumatic events can also be recalled vividly.

perks.name: Thick-Skinned
perks.description: The character has a high pain threshold. Add five points to Stamina and recalculate damage thresholds accordingly.

perks.name: Strong Immune System
perks.description: The character is especially resistant to diseases and drugs. Gain +1 to Health tests against diseases and drugs.

perks.name: Radiation Resistance
perks.description: The character is exceptionally resistant to radiation poisoning. Gain +1 to Health tests against radiation.

perks.name: Sense of Direction
perks.description: The character seems to have a compass in their head and always knows where they are located.

perks.name: Military Rank
perks.description: The character has rank in an organized military force with authority from a nation.
perks.downside: Responsibility: must follow codes of conduct, regulations and orders from superiors.

perks.name: Wealthy
perks.description: The character has money. Each rating is multiplied by 10,000 credits. Rating temporarily reduces by one for a week after each use.
perks.downside: Responsibility: maintain fortunes, possible tax audits and lawsuits.

flaws.name: Addiction
flaws.description: The character is psychologically or physically addicted to a substance that they need regular doses of.

flaws.name: Age: Young
flaws.description: The character is a teenager (13-16 years) or younger, with limits on freedom of movement and how seriously others take their opinions.

flaws.name: Age: Old
flaws.description: The character is a senior citizen (65+ years), with potential health problems and mobility issues.
flaws.upside: May benefit from respect from younger characters.

flaws.name: Amnesiac
flaws.description: The character has no recollection of their life up to a few days or weeks ago.
flaws.upside: Possible unknown allies or skills from past life.

flaws.name: Animal Antipathy
flaws.description: Something about the character disturbs animals. Suffer -1 penalty to Animal handling tests; wild animals are more likely to attack.

flaws.name: Bad Luck
flaws.description: The character is plagued by bad luck. Once per game, an opponent may reroll a Fumble or the GM can switch a die result.

flaws.name: Bloodlust
flaws.description: The character always tries to kill opponents by any means possible, never accepting surrender, nor surrendering themselves.

flaws.name: Code of Honor
flaws.description: The character lives by a restrictive code of honor that they follow even when it puts them at a disadvantage.
flaws.upside: May gain trust and admiration of other honorable people.

flaws.name: Criminal Background
flaws.description: The character committed a criminal act in their past that continues to haunt them, making it hard to get respect or employment.
flaws.upside: Criminal contacts can occasionally be useful.

flaws.name: Curse
flaws.description: One aspect of the character's life (love life, job, friendships, finances, etc.) continuously refuses to 'work out'.

flaws.name: Dependent
flaws.description: The character must take care of someone: an adopted child, a relative, etc. This includes care, protection and friendship.
flaws.upside: The dependent may be helpful in certain situations.

flaws.name: Destitute
flaws.description: The character doesn't have much money and has no secure source of income. Cannot afford more than basics without special arrangements.

flaws.name: Flashbacks
flaws.description: The character has sudden flashbacks of their past, especially in stressful situations. Must make a WIL or PSY test to act.

flaws.name: Goal
flaws.description: The character has a powerful, all-consuming goal to which they are dedicated to the point of obsession.

flaws.name: Heavy Sleeper
flaws.description: The character sleeps like a brick and is very hard to awaken. -3 penalty to wake in dangerous situations.

flaws.name: Lame
flaws.description: The character has a medical problem in one or both legs, causing a -1 modifier to movement-related skill checks.

flaws.name: One-Armed
flaws.description: The character is missing an arm, suffering a -1 modifier to manipulation-related skill checks.

flaws.name: Poor Senses
flaws.description: The character has especially poor senses, suffering a -1 penalty to all related Notice tests.

flaws.name: Radiation Vulnerability
flaws.description: The character is exceptionally vulnerable to radiation poisoning. -1 modifier to Health checks for radiation status.

flaws.name: Slow Healing
flaws.description: The character heals more slowly than other people, needing 50% more time to heal injuries.

flaws.name: Slow Learner
flaws.description: The character has a hard time learning in a structured environment, adding one month to required learning time.

flaws.name: Thin-Skinned
flaws.description: The character has a low pain threshold. Subtract five points from Stamina and recalculate damage thresholds.

flaws.name: Wanted
flaws.description: Somebody is currently chasing the character, often heavily armed pursuers that appear at the worst times.
flaws.upside: Others hunted by the same group may be helpful.

flaws.name: Weak Immune System
flaws.description: The character is especially vulnerable to diseases and drugs. -1 penalty to Health tests against diseases and drugs.
